data.message: Come on Coca Cola, you're not really doing enough to sort this problem out. Many bottles still blow off into the water and end up polluting the sea, turning into micro-plastics and ending up inside marine wildlife. The facts are there. Biodegradable packing is doable.

replies.message: Hi Shannon, at this stage our focus is on recovering all of our packaging so none of it ends up as litter or in the oceans. However, we’re working hard to ensure our packaging is as sustainable as possible. When plastic packaging is responsibly disposed of, it can be recycled and used again and again. We’ve also been researching and creating alternatives to oil based plastics, such as our PlantBottle™, which is the first-ever recyclable plastic bottle made from plants. We use the PlantBottle for all of our Honest Tea and Smartwater range here in Great Britain and are always looking at ways that we can expand its use across our portfolio.
